channel.title: Пекинский Велосипед on Rusland 1

item.title: Пекинский Велосипед – Last Frame
item.description: Beijing Bicycle From Пекинский Велосипед (Peking Bicycle), based in Yekaterinburg. The band’s name also refers to a 2001 film, commonly titled Beijing Bicycle or Shiqi sui de dan che ( Filmpro.ru, IMDb). Последний кадр is the opening track of the EP Не хочу забывать (Don’t Want to Forget, 2018), with the title words also appearing in the song.
